column4: I have a buffalo USB wireless adapter, when i plug it dmesg shows sbcore: registered new interface driver zd1211rw: Im not sure where to go from here, any one here with any experiance with the ZD wireless chips?
works out of the box for my usb wireless adapter with zd
so what is the alias for your wireless ? eth0?
Is there some rudimentray thing im not doing? =s how do i alias the new interface?
or have i just found my google string right there? :)
[   35.550412] zd1211rw 2-6:1.0: RF UNKNOWN_A_RF 0xa is not supported
i can't think of where to go next with this
no worries, thanks for the help anyway
